General.Name: Invibes Advertising NV
General.Description: Invibes Advertising N.V., a technology company, provides digital advertising services. The company's solutions are supported by an in-feed format that is integrated into media content. It develops its technology to help brands to communicate with consumers. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Gent, Belgium.

3.Name: Mr. Tim  Vergouts
3.Title: Chief Sales Officer of INVIBES Benelux
